inn1.comm: right on target on a length, comes slowly off the pitch, defended down the track
gets some away shape from around off, he goes back to push it out
now this one tails in a bit from just around off, he pats it back to PK

and this one goes away from off and gets the edge, beautiful control from PK, making the ball dart around, Guptill had a nervous poke at it from the crease and Parthiv made the easiest of takes, India strike early
gets across and tucks this incoming delivery towards midwicket
pitches it fuller and strikes him on the pads with the angle as he misses the attempted flick, but that was sliding down leg
bangs it in short, Brendon goes for the pull, and gets it high and over midwicket and it falls short just inside the ropes and rolls into the boundary
worked away to square leg
take that! Brendon gets some width outside off, and cuts it in a flash through point for another boundary
Nehra shortens the length now, gets some inward shape off the seam, Brendon tucks it in to the leg side
down the track comes Brendon, and hammers this length delivery over extra cover, and it screams to the boundary, no one moved
walks across and works this one into the gap at midwicket to retain the strike
steers it wristily late down to third man
straight as you get, in the channel close to off, goes back and plays it to PK
now How looks to give the charge, PK is wise to it, shortens the length considerably, he can only push it back down the track
the one that zips away from around off, but a touch short this time, he goes on the back foot and plays it out to mid off
pegging him on the back foot with that short of a good length on the stumps, defended down the pitch
on middle and leg this time, played out to midwicket to end another tight over from PK
better start from Nehra, angles it across Brendon on a length, he pushes it out to point
excellent line, even closer to off stump, and an even better leave from Brendon who shoulders arms at the lastest possible instant

Nehra gets the big wicket! Brendon walked across his stumps and tried to work this length ball down to fine leg, missed and was hit flush in front, and the finger went up straight away, 150th wicket for Ashish in ODIs, the openers are gone, India on top at the moment
he is settling into a nice rhythm here, in the corridor outside off stump, Taylor leaves it alone
Taylor leans into this length ball going across him and sends it into the gap between mid off and extra cover all along the ground, classy shot
too close for comfort to leave around off stump,  but Taylor shows good judgment in letting it go
good control from PK, pitches it full around off stump, How gets right forward to defend
squares him up with a length delivery that straightens, but the leading edge goes into the gap at covers
no room to work with, bang on off stump, blocked down the track
PK now gets this one to come in, How had his front foot planted down the track, and got his bat around it just in time to work it to midwicket for a single, that could have been close had he missed
gets some rare width now, and cuts into the gap between cover and point for a boundary
PK goes back to the wicket-to-wicket stuff, and How pushes it back off the front foot
punched off the back foot to short extra cover
another lovely drive from Taylor, gets to the pitch of this fullish ball and pings the gap between short extra cover and mid off, as smooth as it gets
Nehra pitches it a touch short, and he goes back to work it to cover

and another one goes! Taylor went for the pull to a surprise short delivery that climbed high over him, and got it off the glove for Parthiv to take another easy catch, now Nehra has 150 wickets for India, he is shaking his head as he walks back, Ross
shortish and going across Scott, who shoulders arms
goes for the square drive but doesn't get the timing right, Kohli runs in from backward point and fields
PK continues to give nothing away, as another one in the corridor outside off is pushed down to mid on
good bowling, pitches it further up looking for the swing, he gets forward and drives to mid off
goes shortish this time, punched off the back foot towards mid off
rare bad delivery from PK, on the pads, and clipped away in a flash in front of square for a boundary
PK goes back to the nagging line around off stump, he gets right forward and defends
coming in with the angle on middle stump, pushed down to mid on off the back foot
worked away to midwicket off the back foot, it was in the air for a while
in the slot, and put away in style in the gap at extra cover and mid off for a boundary, got right to the pitch and held the pose for effect
played back to the bowler
gets outside off and drives this fullish ball to point, didn't get the timing on that one
on middle and leg, tucked away to mid wicket
stays back and opens the bat face to run down this length delivery to third man
PK has hardly given anything away here, and he continues to peg away around off stump, Styris goes back to defend
drives hard but cannot beat Tiwary at mid off who runs across and fields
looking for the leg before with the one that comes in with the angle, drives it down to mid on
steady stuff from just back of a length this time, played out to short extra cover off the back foot
gets the front foot across and works this one away to fine leg
PK strays down the leg side looking for that angle in to the batsman
watchfully forward in defence is How, and short extra cover fields
punches this back of a length delivery but not much power in the shot, and cover runs around and fields
dropped Yusuf went low down to his right at short extra cover to a back foot punch from Styris, but just about manages to get a hand to it, that would have been a stunner had he taken it
driven airily down to Gautam at mid off who misfields and lets a couple of runs
worked to midwicket for a single off the back foot
bows it fuller outside off stump, he gets forward and defends
Nehra tries to do a Taylor on How, but gets the short delivery too far down leg even as Jamie misses on the pull, don't ask me how
elegant on drive from How, and the overpitched delivery races away through midwicket for a boundary all along the carpet
driven down to mid off
driven again off the back foot but straight to extra cover
PK bangs it in short, Styris weaves out of the pull as it goes just over his head, not called a wide
swatted away to the deep midwicket boundary, where Vijay dives and half-stops it, then dives  again and stops it fully as it rolls away almost into the ropes
PK bowls another short one, and he goes for the pull, and gets it behind deep square for a boundary
better stuff from PK, on the stumps, defended off the back foot
bowls a loosener outside off, but Styris misses out, hitting it to extra cover
there's no missing out this time, as this overpitched ball is crashed just to the left of Rohit at cover, he was late to get down, and by the time he did, the ball had crossed the boundary
and is in business right away as Styris drives this one to him
better from Munaf, back of a length in the channel outside off, left alone
punched off the back foot, Yuvraj gets to his right from extra cover and fields
watches this one outside off stump closely, and leaves it alone in the end
flights it on the off stump, gets some turn, off the pads and rolls away in the leg side
turns into the batsman from off again, played down near leg slip
gets forward and plays with the turn to midwicket
sharp turn for Ashwin, they appeal for the catch as it lobs up to leg slip, but it came off the pads
pushed back to the bowler
he is having some issues with the turn, lunges forward and is hit on the body as it comes in from outside off, good start from Ashwin
driven powerfully off the front foot, but straight to mid off
touch shorter from Munaf, head on top of the ball as he defends
creamed on one knee but cannot beat Kohli at backward point, he is striking them crisply
gets forward and drives to Rohit at short extra cover this time
straightens a touch from just around off stump, he goes back to defend
drives in the gap this time, but there is the man on the sweeper boundary and he keeps them to a couple
sweeps from way outside off stump, gets a top edge that falls well short of the man at deep square leg
reaches out and defends back to Ashwin
sweeps again, along the ground this time to deep square
drives with the turn wide of Tiwary at long on for a couple, neatly done
turns in sharply from around off stump, worked away down to fine leg
the carrom ball arrives, and produces a leading edge as it turns away a touch from leg stump, but the ball falls well short of extra cover, he was playing for the turn
Munaf sprays it wide outside off and is cut away to the sweeper for a single
gets to the pitch of this fuller delivery and drives to short extra cover
lovely delivery, he went for the drive again, but it shaped away off the seam, and beat him completely, Parthiv grimaces
taps it towards mid on and looks for the single, but Nehra is quickly get to the ball, and they decide against the run
gets a thick outside edge to third man
driven elegantly but without any power to shortish extra cover
more turn for Ashwin, but too short, and helped away down to fine leg
he is getting prodigious turn, and some bounce too this time, loops up in the air, but no one at short leg
another one goes in the air in the direction of short leg
loud appeal for leg before, but he was struck outside the line of off as he missed out on the sweep
played back to the bowler
bounces big on the batsman who goes across and keeps it down near the stumps
steered to third man off the back foot
nicely flighted but on leg stump, driven down to long on
flat and turning away from middle, played out in front of point off the front foot
speared into the pads, tucked away to midwicket for a single

he's bowled 'em, it pitched on off stump, he tried to go back and work it on the leg side, it straightened and beat the waft to crash in to the off stump, Yuvraj strikes in his first over, he got in to a very awkward position in the end and was in the air as he played the shot
lets this one outside off stump alone, and it turns in sharply but no harm done, this track is assisting the spinners a lot
picked from outside off and driven with the turn to long on
cut away to the man on the sweeper boundary
in trouble again with the turn as he presses forward outside off stump and is hit on the body

Ashwin gets one this time! Styris looked to belatedly sweep this fuller one into the leg side, missed the line and was hit bang in front of the stumps, the umpire had not doubt about that one, New Zealand are tottering now
turned in sharply and almost slipped through the gap between bat and pad as Elliott pressed forward outside off stump
gets to the pitch and defends out towards slip this time
gets forward to the pitch and drives to long off
paddles this fullish one on middle to square leg
spears it in on middle and it turns square wide outside off stump, Elliott could not do anything about it

The Kiwi Kollapse continues, it was the arm ball going straight on with the angle, Elliott pushed forward outside the line playing for the turn, and was hit on the pads, umpire Saheba raised his finger right away, Yuvi picks up another one
gets forward and pushed down the track
Dan the nurdler nurdles this one fine on the leg side and is off the mark
on off stump, defended off the back foot
full toss driven down to long off
Dan goes for the sweep to a fuller one, and the ball rolls away in front of square
plays it to the left of mid off and the single is easily taken
excellent seam position and the ball spins away from off stump, lovely delivery
played back to the bowler
turning in from outside leg, worked away through midwicket
turns away from off stump, slapped away to sweeper cover
worked away down to fine leg off the back foot
slow turn for Yusuf, punched down to long off for a single
on leg stump, played out in the on side, Parthiv runs and fields
sweeps this full delivery to deep square leg and they trot across for a single
turning away from round the stumps, hit in the air but wide of the man at forward short leg
goes for a half-hearted sweep and the top edge flies fine down the leg side
nicely flighted around off but he leaves it alone even as it turns away
gets forward and opens the face of the bat to run it past slip, partly intentional that
sweeps in the air just over the man at square leg, Nehra rushes across from fine leg, finds he has overrun the ball, and adjusts awkwardly to stop it near the ropes
turning and bouncing outside off stump, left alone

Yusuf gets one now! it was fired in on leg stump from round the wicket, Dan pushed forward to cover the turn, but it spun across his bat, produced the edge and Yuvraj did the rest at slip, Yusuf is all smiles, New Zealand are in total disarray
gets across and outside off, and chips it in the air towards long on
keeps his bat aside pad and pushes this spinning delivery down the track
goes back and is squared up, but the edge goes safely backward of point
tries to sweep, but the ball rolls away behind Parthiv on the leg side
goes straight on with the arm, he gets an inside edge down towards fine leg as he pushes forward
tosses it up, Franklin defends off the front foot
shorter this time, punched away towards extra cover, and the ball rolls away towards point
goes for the slog sweep and connects well, all the way over deep midwicket for a six, welcome runs for New Zealand
pushed to point off the front foot
played out off the back foot in to the off side
stays in the crease and steers it to point

goes across and outside off, and whips this fullish delivery to midwicket, Virat fires in the throw, but Franklin had just made his ground at the non-striker's, as replays confirm, sharp work in the field though

and another one falls! Nathan went for the sweep, and the ball went up in the air for Yuvi to take a dolly at slip, umpire Saheba thinks thats off the bat, but replays show it came off the forearm, Nathan is not impressed, nothing is going right for New Zealand
bowls it fuller on off stump, pushed back to the bowler
turns in on leg stump, he gets it fine past the diving leg slip fielder for a boundary
leans forward and plays with the turn to midwicket
defended solidly off the front foot down the track
whipped away off the back foot down to long on, he is bowling it a touch short here
the carrom ball, turns away and rushes through past the outside edge as he pushes forward outside off stump
this one turns in sharply, and he takes it high on the pad
another carrom ball, tossed up for the drive around off stump, Mills does but straight to Tiwary at extra cover, second one for Ashwin
one more carrom ball, bang on middle stump, patted back to the bowler
it's all over for New Zealand, this one was turning in on leg stump, bounced a bit, Southee failed to keep it down, and Rohit at forward short leg took a sharp catch, the Indians are delighted

inn2.comm: short and turning away from round the stumps, he mistimes the cut
turns away from close to off stump, left alone

and he strikes third ball! it was too close to cut, and went straight on around off stump, but Gautam went for the shot nevertheless, and got an edge to Brendon, umpire Kettleborough thought long before slowly raising the finger, could New Zealand make something out of this?
drives this overpitched delivery hard down to deepish mid on
Dan throws himself to his left at mid off ti cut off a crisp front foot drive from Virat
played with the turn to a diving midwicket, they are going to give it everything in the field
pitches on middle and turns way down the leg side from over the wicket, beats keeper and leg slip on its way for five wides
defended off the front foot
goes for the pull, it was flatter and quicker and he is hit on the body
tucked away down to deep square leg off the back foot
tossed up on off, defended off the front foot
right forward in defence is Virat
rapped on the pads, Dan thinks that's out and runs down the pitch in celebration, umpire Saheba is unmoved, Dan cannot believe it, replays show an inside edge onto pad there
beats him in the flight, and he lofts it just over extra cover
almost yorks him, he digs it out to mid on
full delivery, whipped down to mid on
goes on with the arm from round the stumps, and strikes him on the pads as he presses forward, that looked very close, not given
shortish, he rocks back but misses out on the pull as it goes straight on
tossed up on leg stump, driven to left of mid on
tossed up delivery, lofted in the air over extra cover, pulled back just inside the ropes
Dan gets his man now, it was fired in on the stumps, Virat chose to stay on the back foot, the ball went off the push to Taylor at slip who held on to the sharp take, game on here, bring it on!
flighted on the middle and leg line, defended off the front foot
goes straight on with the arm around off stump, Yuvraj gets an edge as he presses forward, and it rolls way past slip for a boundary, gripping stuff
goes for the big sweep from outside off, gets it off the edge down to fine leg
driven down to long on for a single
tossed up in the air but on leg stump, flicked away through square leg
gets forward and is hit on the pads, but that was going down leg, seemed to be an inside edge as well
goes for the huge slog sweep, gets it along the ground to deep square leg
turn and bounce on middle stump, Parthiv gets a leading edge that fall short of Nathan, this new ball is proving difficult to handle
goes back in the crease and is hit on the pads, looked to be going just down leg side
takes it on the full and flicks it down to deep square leg, end of another good over
back of a length around off stump, he goes back to defend towards cover
pushed down the track towards mid on off the back foot
taps this fuller ball in front of cover and scampers for a quick single
lovely delivery, coming in with the angle and straightening around off, beats Yuvraj on the forward press, he had to play at that one
gets right behind the line this time and defends in textbook fashion
more correct defence from Yuvraj, that man at short mid off fields
takes a step down the track, drives on the full but finds the man at mid on
takes it on the half volley this time but cannot beat mid on
gets it in to the gap this time, leaned into the shot and drove past a diving mid off for a boundary
skips down the track again, he fires it in, Parthiv takes it on the pad
consistently using his feet, he flicks this away to deep midwicket for a couple
whips it wristily down the ground but mid on cuts it off
moves away sharply off the seam after pitching on back of a length around off, Yuvraj is surprised as he leaves it alone, Scott smiles
played back to the bowler
fuller on middle stump, Yuvraj gets forward and defends
gets into an awkward position as Styris fires it in on leg stump, but adjusts late to defend it down the track
breaks the shackles with a clean lofted hit over extra cover, it was in the slot and he went through with the shot
reverts to the forward press to a length delivery around off stump
short and wide, he cuts hard in the air, a diving point can't get to it, third man runs across and puts in the dive, gets a hand to it, but it rolls away over the ropes
drives through extra cover this time, but it is pulled back inside the boundary
Mills bowls it shorter, and Parthinv adjusts to keep it down in front of point
the extra pace is helping Parthiv time his shots, as another delivery is sent racing through covers for a boundary
goes back to this back of a length ball, and guides it past short third man to a squarish third man
serves it short, and it sits up, Yuvraj likes it there and pulls it with disdain high over midwicket, the pressure is off now
flat and turning in from outside off, he makes room to cut it to point
goes down the track, Dan bowls it even flatter, he pushes it back to the bowler
goes for the sweep and misses as he is hit on the body
makes room outside leg and cuts it through point, Mills ends up running along side the ball for some time before picking it up
played out in to the on side
tossed up and straightening in around off stump, he stays on the back foot and pushes out towards point
and is driven to mid off as he bowls a flighted delivery
Yuvraj gets forward and pushes down the track
defended off the front foot, it went straight on with the arm
brings up the 50 with a glorious cover drive that races into the boundary, got right to the pitch of the flighted ball
tossed up on the stumps, defended off the front foot
sweeps this fullish delivery forcefully and gets it wide of deep square leg
driven down to long on
swings across the line, and gets it high over midwicket, the timing on that is so good that it carries all the way over the ropes
comes down the track and drives it back to the bowler
touch shorter from Dan, he goes back to defend down the track
turning down the leg side, nurdled away but Guptill at forward short leg is alert and gets to his left to field
gets forward to defend
tossed up delivery, huge inside edge on to pad as he pushes forward, Nathan appeals anyway
gets right behind the line to defend down the track
worked away down the leg side, but short fine leg cuts it off
goes down on a knee and slog sweeps, doesn't get the timing right but it is in the gap and runs into the deep midwicket boundary
is beaten on the cut, it was bowled flatter and quicker
drops it short, Yuvraj rocks back and goes for the dismissive pull, gets a top edge but the power on the shot carries it well over the deep midwicket  boundary for maximum
drops it short and is pulled away backward of square for another boundary
better length and line on the stumps, he defends off the front foot
short of a good length from Grant, Parthiv goes back to push it into the off side
played out to mid on
bounces on Parthiv, who keeps it down to cover
bowls it fuller and Parthiv chips it in the air over cover for a single, he had shaped up to go for the big lofted shot but checked the bat swing in the end
reaches out to guide this length delivery to backward point
bowling off cutters is Scott, comes slowly off the pitch, and he steers it to short third man
can't beat short third with the cute steer again
angled in on off stump, and moves away, Parthiv is beaten as he pushes at it, lovely delivery, wasn't far from the edge
tucked square on the leg side for a single
lunges forward and defends out to extra cover
whipped away down to a deepish mid on
defends off the front foot, Elliott puts his hands on his knees asks the question, more out of hope than anything else
defended in to the covers
flicked behind square leg for a single
Yuvraj stays back and slaps this length delivery in the gap  between point and cover for a boundary, how deft was that
defended off the front foot, India are doing it without fuss here
Parthiv waits for this back of a length ball to come to him, and then wristily pulls it to deep midwicket
Yuvraj is wise to that sharp off cutter now, pulls his bat out of the way as it moves away
adjusts to play another off cutter to point off the back foot
tucked away off the pads fine down the leg side
goes back and punches it to mid on with that high backlift
fuller on off stump this time, Yuvraj defends off the front foot, head right on top of the ball
wide outside off stump, slashed hard in the air towards sweeper cover
hit out to sweeper cover for a single
extra cover pulls of a fine diving save and gets applause from the crowd
short and wide, Parthiv opens the bat face very late to steer it fine down to third man for a boundary, Brendon had almost prepared to take that one
played towards midwicket for a single
struck on the pads, Elliott pleads, the shouts, then bellows, but that man umpire Saheba remains stonefaced, looked to be going down leg, but replays show it just hitting leg stump
gets it on the pads as he presses forward
cut off the backfoot  wide of the man at sweeper
sharp turn and bounce for Dan, Parthiv keeps it down with soft hands
Parthiv comes down the track, drives this one towards midwicket and sets off for the single, but is sent back rightly
drives again, but now Dan runs across the pitch and cuts it off
defended off the front foot
leans forward and clips this one to midwicket
fired in on the pads, he lunges at it and works it to midwicket
drives stylishly but cannot beat extra cover
clean as a whistle, casually lifts this half volley over mid off and it goes all the way for six, "timing, timing," goes SMGavaskar on air
defended off the back foot as Elliott bowls it shorter
almost yorks him this time, but Yuvi is up to it and keeps it out
whips this full delivery wide of long on to move on to 49
picks this from way outside off and slap-drives it down to long on to get Parthiv on strike
turns in sharply and hits him on the pads, it lobs up in the air, they appeal for the catch as Brendon takes it
defended down the track
gets to his second half-century with a skip down the track and a drive through midwicket, acknowledges the crowd, he has played the spinners so well
carefully played out in to the on side

scores the winning runs with a pull to the deep midwicket boundary off a long hop from Elliott, there's the clean sweep for India, the second time they have won 5-0 after beating England by the same margin in 2008, and it's come just at the innings cut-off mark.
